Egypt and the Egyptians have a free constitution that is not a grant from anyone, nor a dictator or dictator of a constitution chosen by the people of Egypt with their free and conscious will.
This great people have proved to the whole world that his civilization, which is striking in the depths of history, is still alive in reality
The referendum was conducted in full transparency, with full judicial supervision and supervision by the media, civil society organizations and the protection of the People's Army and its police
Greetings to the Supreme Elections Committee and to the honorable judges who were keen to show the people their will
Greetings to our valiant armed forces that protect the borders and do not lag behind the people and the nation if called by the president
Greetings to the Egyptian police, who will remain faithful to their duty, protect security, safeguard rights and abide by the law
I would like to express my thanks and appreciation to all those who participated in the management of this great national work of working men and women civilians, trustees and their assistants
We all lived days of anticipation and concern in which it was my responsibility to move the country to safety and to end the transitional period lasted nearly two years # President
Political forces have taken different positions, which is normal in a society that moves towards democracy and diversity of opinion in a healthy phenomenon benefiting the free societies

Some did not realize the difference between the right to peaceful expression of opinion, which was confirmed by the revolution and the resort to violence and the attempt to impose opinion by disrupting institutions and intimidation ...
The glorious 25th of January Revolution struck an example for the whole world on peaceful revolutionary and political action and its commitment to a high standard of creation and urbanization
Whatever the difficulties of the previous stage, I see it as the pain of the birth of a new dawn # President
The Egyptian people once again proved their ability to overcome the odds and move forward on the road to completing the construction of their democratic institutions
During this interim period there were errors and pitfalls from here and there, and I bear with you responsibility in this period
God knows that I do not make a decision except for the face of God and for the interest of the homeland is not a lover of power and not keen to acquire it # President
All I hope for is the renaissance of my country and moving it to a new stage where we begin together the epic of building and producing the president
Is designed to enforce the will of the people in Egypt to have a constitution that stabilizes the situation and is based on institutions and opens the door to development, progress and social justice
I have taken the responsibility of taking many difficult decisions in the belief that this constitution should be a permanent charter to which we all belong
The Constitution makes the President of the Republic a servant of the people with a specific authority, not an absolute master or an autocratic ruler
By passing this constitution, the legislation passed on to the people's representatives in the Shura Council until the legislative power was completed by electing a House of Representatives

Our democratic system is complemented by an elected president and a powerful parliament that legislates, supervises and powers an independent judiciary and government without the consent of the people's representatives in parliament.

I pay tribute to the noble national position of the adviser Mahmoud Makki, who played his role with full force and sincerity in order to pass the constitution. He knows that he does not provide for a vice president

The constitution adopted by the people came as a reflection of the spirit of the glorious January Revolution. It was founded on the right of citizenship where everyone is equal without discrimination or discrimination.

The Constitution upholds human dignity and protects its freedoms and affirms that the dignity of the individual is the dignity of the nation and that there is no dignity for a country where women do not respect.
The Constitution guarantees the subsistence of the workers and makes the work, housing, education and health rights guaranteed by the state and guaranteed by law # President

The Constitution guarantees the freedom of thought, opinion and creativity, establishes the values ​​of moderation and moderation, and makes the rule of law the basis for individual freedom and the legitimacy of authority
The constitution makes national unity a pillar and a pillar of state building, protects the rights of workers and peasants and preserves property.

The constitution allows the formation of parties and the issuance of newspapers as soon as the notification and preserve the identity of Arab and Islamic Egypt and emphasizes its intellectual and cultural leadership
The people passed the constitution by nearly two-thirds majority # President
There is a respectable sector of our people who has chosen to say no and this is their right because Egypt's revolution will never narrow down with the national opposition
Who said No, and to whom he said Yes, I thank you because we do not want to go back to the era of one opinion or the false majorities made by the president
The result of the referendum shows a real cultural and democratic maturity that promises that Egypt has gone through the path of democracy without going back
Efforts must be made to build the nation, and for that reason dialogue has become a necessity to be replaced by the president
In the framework of the dialogue, we seek integration and consensus on the issues of the next phase
I call upon all political parties and forces to participate in the national dialogue sessions sponsored by the president
I will always be as I promised the people of Greater Egypt servant of this people spare no effort in working with all his sons in favor of Egypt and the Egyptians.
The coming days are days of work and effort from everyone and I will do my best to push forward the economy, which faces huge challenges and has great opportunities for growth.
I will make all the necessary changes needed for this success for Egypt's success and to put the path of comprehensive development at the center of everyone's attention
The current government is playing its role as much as possible in difficult circumstances and there are problems and we need more effort and work # President
I charged Dr. Hisham Qandil, the Prime Minister, and consulted with him to make the necessary ministerial amendments appropriate to this stage
I feel the lowest income people in the Egyptian society and feel what they suffer these days and I will not allow them to suffer more suffering.
I will work with the government and all state institutions to provide the best of the Egyptian economy with the support of citizens
I renew the Covenant and the oath before you to respect the law and the Constitution and to take full care of the interests of the people and safeguard the homeland and its territorial integrity
Greetings to the people who came out to say his word # President
The coming days will witness the launch of new projects in the field of services and production and a package of facilities for investors to support the Egyptian market and its economy
